This study randomize , double-blind comparison CJC-1134-PC versus placebo . Patients take metformin continue take metformin dose duration study . Patients T2DM , meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion , randomly assign treatment arm . All patient undergo weekly clinic visit receive 17 week study treatment , include titration period . CJC-1134-PC placebo treatment administer weekly subcutaneous injection abdomen patient fast state . Patients closely monitor evaluated toxicity ongoing basis .
